proposedChanges.value: Position hero section to ensure visibility above the fold on all devices.
proposedChanges.rationale: Ensures immediate engagement and clarity of product promise.

proposedChanges.value: Add a clear and prominent CTA button in the hero section.
proposedChanges.rationale: Encourages immediate action from visitors upon landing.

proposedChanges.value: Simplify pricing section with clear visual tiers and benefits.
proposedChanges.rationale: Improves understanding and comparison of pricing options.

proposedChanges.value: Include customer testimonials and success stories prominently.
proposedChanges.rationale: Builds credibility and demonstrates real-world success.
Creates a logical flow that leads to conversion.

proposedChanges.value: Introduce a sticky CTA button for easy access at all times.
proposedChanges.rationale: Maintains conversion focus throughout the user's journey.

proposedChanges.value: Add a dedicated trust section with certifications and recognitions.
Ensure hero image and text stack correctly on mobile to maintain clarity.
proposedChanges.rationale: Improves mobile user experience and message delivery.

risks: Changes might disrupt current design harmony
assumptions: Current design does not effectively convert
Pricing structure is well-defined but poorly communicated
